Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires washing machines to meet certain filtration system requirements
Summary: Requires washing machines sold after a certain date to contain a microfiber filtration system that meets certain specifications.
LawCode: Add ยง396-uu, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring washing machines to meet certain filtration system requirements
